May Fundraiser

Sponsor Our Monkey Exhibit

We are trying to raise £10,000 to fund our beautiful monkeys. Every little heps during these difficult times. Thank you from everyone here at JEM Zoo and thank you from the monkeys.

Conservation

Zoos like ours are conservation powerhouses. Our unique combination of living collections, millions of visitors, scientific support and wide ranging skills can be harnessed to make a substantial contribution to the transformative change required.

We at JEM ZOO are already at the forefront of tackling biodiversity loss and leading behaviour change amongst our visitors and supporters. Our work is evidence-based, grounded in the interlinking of science and practice.

Fundraising

Here at JEM ZOO we are dedicated to creating a safe place for all animals. In order for us to keep our efforts going we need Your Help!!!

There are many ways you can show your support and one of those ways is through attending our fundraising events.

We raise funds for many different causes. Together we are all doing our part to preserve Planet Earth.

Check Out This Months Fundraiser!

Our Animals

JEM ZOO cars for a large amount of animals. We take this responsibility very serious and give all our animals the best of care. You donations and support helps us to keep up this vital work and without the public's contributions and good will we would not be able to do what we do.

Thank You Soooooo Much!

Plants and Gardens

Take a stroll around our beautiful gardens and take a look at all our wonderful plants. We have a fantastic selection of plants and flowers that help enrich the atmosphere around the zoo and attract local wildlife.

Events Showcase

JEM ZOO Nature Reserve Walk - Family Fun

A relaxed walk with our friendly staff to guide you through our breathtaking nature reserve. Refreshments are provided. Discover the beauty of the local wildlife and plants with a walk through the our Nature Reserve. Staff will be on hand to bring to your attention natures little creatures and share there knowledge of the area. Something the whole family could enjoy and the fresh air will also be beneficial.

*Max of 6 per group*

Tickets only £5.99

Enquire at the ticket office.

Tea & Cake Talk/Q&A - Adults

Enjoy a talk about various animals by one of our specialist while being served tea and cake. Ask any questions you may have about the animals at chester zoo, tips abut what you can do to attract more wildlife in your garden or how to maintain the wildlife already present in your garden. We also love hearing about your tips and suggestions as well as what you have been doing to preserve nature.

*Max of 20 people per session*

Tea & cake priced separately

Enquire at the ticket office.

Photography Workshop - Children

Here at JEM ZOO we are offering a very special photography workshop for our junior customers. Zoo Photography for Children is a 6-hours photography workshop, which provides an ideal opportunity for children, about photography and wildlife; and to do this together with one of their parents or another guardian.

*Aged between 8 and 15*

Tickets only £19.99

Enquire at the ticket office.

June Fundraiser

JEM ZOO Costume Party - *Adults Only*

Dress up as your favorite animal and come party with us here at JEM ZOO. Due to the current situation this event is not 100% confirmed as we await further updates from the government. Please continue to remain patient and supportive during these challenging times. All funds will go towards the charity Friends of the Earth.

Tickets around £19.99
